#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long int gcd(long int a,long int b);
int main()
{
	long int t;
	long int n,m;long int a=2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cin>>m;
		if(n==m)
		cout<<n;
		else if(n==1&&m!=1)
		cout<<m;
		else if(m==1&&n!=1)
		cout<<n;
		else
		{if(m>n)
		a=gcd(m-1,n-1)+1;
		else
		a=gcd(n-1,m-1)+1;
		cout<<a;
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	return 0;
	}
	long int gcd(long int a,long int b)
	{
		if(b==0)
		return a;
		else
		gcd(b,a%b);
		
		
	}
